mapper.select: SELECT IF(vut.parent_id = 0, 0, t.team_id) AS team_id, t.invite_token AS token, vut.team_name, vut2.team_name AS parent_team_name FROM ${tablePrefix}space_invite_link t LEFT JOIN ${tablePrefix}unit_team vut ON vut.id = t.team_id AND vut.is_deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN ${tablePrefix}unit_team vut2 ON vut2.id = vut.parent_id AND vut2.is_deleted = 0 WHERE t.creator = #{memberId} AND t.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY t.created_at DESC
